title: PullGuardian
shortDescription: AI-powered code review and security audit tool
description: PullGuardian is an open-source, AI-powered platform designed to automate and elevate code quality and security audits. It seamlessly integrates into GitHub/GitLab workflows and CI/CD pipelines to catch issues before they hit production.
achievements: Multi-language support (Python, Java, JS, Go)
AI-driven code smell detection and bad-practice spotting
Static security analysis with secret scanning
GitHub/GitLab PR integration with automated comments
whyItMatters: Helps development teams catch security vulnerabilities and code quality issues before they reach production, saving time and reducing risk.

title: oneQlick
shortDescription: Production-ready food delivery platform for rural areas
description: A comprehensive food delivery ecosystem designed specifically for rural areas, featuring separate user and partner mobile apps built with React Native (Expo) and a robust FastAPI backend with PostgreSQL database. Includes a dedicated search service for optimized food discovery.
achievements: Built complete microservices architecture with separate user, partner, and search services
Implemented real-time order tracking and notifications
Optimized search functionality for fast food discovery
Designed scalable backend handling concurrent orders
whyItMatters: Bridges the gap in food delivery services for rural communities, providing economic opportunities for local restaurants and convenience for customers.

title: Internal Hire - Expertise Locator
shortDescription: AI-powered employee expertise matching using vector search
description: An AI vector-search based web application built with Streamlit that enables organizations to efficiently search for colleagues with specific expertise based on their resumes. Uses TiDB Vector Database, LangChain, and Google AI for intelligent matching and chat-based interactions with search results.
achievements: Implemented vector embeddings for semantic resume search
Built interactive dashboard with HR metrics and charts
Enabled chat-based interaction with search results
Automated resume processing and storage pipeline
whyItMatters: Facilitates internal talent discovery and mentorship matching, helping organizations leverage existing expertise and reduce external hiring costs.

title: Expertise Locator
description: A web-based application that allows organizations to efficiently search for colleagues with specific expertise based on their resumes. Built with Flask and TiDB, featuring TF-IDF vectorization and cosine similarity for accurate skill matching.
achievements: Supports PDF and DOCX resume uploads
TF-IDF vectorization for efficient text search
Secure TiDB database integration with SSL
Real-time similarity scoring for expertise matching
whyItMatters: Provides a lightweight solution for knowledge sharing and expertise discovery within organizations.

title: 24/7 Gym
shortDescription: Modern gym website with TypeScript and React
description: A responsive and modern gym website built with TypeScript and React, featuring membership plans, class schedules, trainer profiles, and online booking functionality.
achievements: Fully responsive design for all devices
Interactive class schedule and booking system
Modern UI with smooth animations
Fast deployment on Vercel
whyItMatters: Demonstrates proficiency in modern frontend development with TypeScript and React best practices.

title: The Den Gym
shortDescription: Premium gym landing page with TypeScript
description: A sleek and professional gym landing page showcasing premium fitness facilities, personal training services, and membership options. Built with modern web technologies for optimal performance.
achievements: Premium design with attention to detail
Optimized images and assets for fast loading
SEO-friendly structure
Mobile-first responsive design
whyItMatters: Showcases ability to create visually appealing, conversion-focused landing pages.

title: HireMe Mailer
shortDescription: Automated bulk email service for job applications
description: A Python-based automation tool for sending personalized bulk emails to potential employers. Features template customization, attachment support, and delivery tracking.
achievements: Automated email sending with personalization
Support for attachments (resume, cover letter)
Template-based email generation
Delivery status tracking
whyItMatters: Streamlines the job application process, saving time for job seekers while maintaining personalization.

title: Ensights - Product Analytics SaaS
shortDescription: Custom analytics platform inspired by PostHog
description: A product analytics SaaS tool designed to track user behavior and provide actionable insights. Built with FastAPI backend for event logging, session analysis, and real-time dashboards. Inspired by PostHog's architecture but customized for specific business needs.
achievements: Real-time event tracking and session logging
Custom dashboard for product teams
Session replay and user journey analysis
High-performance data pipeline with ClickHouse
whyItMatters: Provides product teams with deep insights into user behavior, enabling data-driven decision making and product improvements.
note: Internal company project - code not publicly available

title: Encatch - Feedback Form Engine
shortDescription: 360Â° employee feedback and performance review platform
description: An internal tool to manage performance reviews and gather 360-degree feedback. Migrated from Spring Boot to FastAPI for improved performance and scalability. Features secure REST APIs for feedback workflows, user roles, and analytics.
achievements: Migrated backend from Spring Boot to FastAPI, improving response times by 40%
Implemented role-based access control for feedback workflows
Built analytics dashboard for HR insights
Automated feedback collection and reminder system
whyItMatters: Streamlines performance review processes and provides valuable insights for employee development and organizational growth.
note: Internal company project - code not publicly available
